pytorch_privacy.optimizer.wrapper_optimizer module¶

class pytorch_privacy.optimizer.wrapper_optimizer.WrapperOptimizer[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Abstract class for wrapping up base PyTorch optimisers. This exists to allow either a standard or DP optimiser to be passed to a method or class with an identical interface, as extending the base optimisers to do differential privacy in PyTorch was not possible in a clean manner.

abstract fit_batch(x, y)[source]¶

Fit a single batch of x, y pairs using the wrapped optimiser, doing a single gradient step :param x: :param y: :return:

get_logged_statistics()[source]¶

Return any relevant statistics about the optimisation process that might be of interest for inspection. E.g. this could be statistics about the gradients, or the clipping of gradients for DP optimisers. :return: A nested dictionary structure of logged statistics

get_step_summary()[source]¶

Return a simple summary of the step if this is desired. Designed to be able to report on the fly metrics for monitoring purposes :return: A nested dictionary of summary information
